channel.title: How do i change the amount of experience needed to get 99 in a skill?
channel.description: On my server, It's too easy to get 99 in a skill. How can i change the amount of experience required to get 99 in a skill?

item.source: How do i change the amount of experience needed to get 99 in a skill?

item.title: How do i change the amount of experience needed to get 99 in a skill?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

} double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(###*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(###*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(###*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(@@@*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;

Change the ### to atk str def exp rate

change the @@@ to the atk str def exp rate

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the amount of experience needed to get 99 in a skill?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

in client.java (NOTE - this will need to be done many times)
Change all variables using “xprate” to what you want, make sure you read what it is adding the xp to before you set it there, otherwise it could set leveling off-balance

Read full topic
